src:
- Trygdeskandalen må granskes av Stortinget
Jonas Gahr Støre:
04 Nov 2019, 13:24 by NTB og Simen Granviken
Arbeiderpartiets leder Jonas Gahr Støre sier trygdeskandalen må behandles i Stortingets kontrollkomité.
Gahr Støre mener Stortinget også må å igangsette egen stortinggranskning.
text:
- The social security scandal must be examined by the Storting
Jonas Gahr Støre:
04 Nov 2019, 13:24 by NTB and Simen Granviken
The leader of the Labor Party Jonas Gahr Støre says the social security scandal must be dealt with in the Storting's control committee.
Gahr Støre believes that the Storting must also initiate its own parliamentary review.
